short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to allow you to share screen with Yack.net.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share your screen or a selected window from your computer during a call on Yack.net.

When you share your screen during a recorded call, your screen will be recorded along with the rest of the call.

Yack.net is a team collaboration tool that includes calls which are recorded and automatically transcribed to create meeting minutes.
